member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings
member.summary: This class provides the structure of the ReportingCloud account settings.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.SerialNumber
member.summary: The serial number that is attached to the account. Possible values are FREE, TRIAL and a 13 character long serial number.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.CreatedDocuments
member.summary: The number of created documents in the current month.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.UploadedTemplates
member.summary: The number of uploaded templates to the template storage.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.MaxDocuments
member.summary: The maximum number of documents that can be created per month.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.MaxTemplates
member.summary: The maximum number of templates that can be uploaded to the template storage.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.ValidUntil
member.summary: Returns the date until the current subscription is valid. The date string includes the time zone of the server (UTC). Sample: 2016-06-06T11:25:44+00:00.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.MaxProofingTransactions
member.summary: The maximum number of proofing transactions per month.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.AccountSettings.ProofingTransactions
member.summary: The number of proofing transactions in the current month.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.APIKey
member.summary: This class implements the structure of the returned API Key objects.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.APIKey.Key
member.summary: The actual API Key

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.APIKey.Active
member.summary: Specified whether this API Key is active or not

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat
member.summary: This enumeration provides the supported document return formats.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.PDF
member.summary: Adobe PDF

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.PDFA
member.summary: Adobe PDF/A

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.DOC
member.summary: Microsoft Word 97-2003

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.DOCX
member.summary: Microsoft Office Open XML

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.RTF
member.summary: Rich Text Format

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.TX
member.summary: TX Text Control Internal Format

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat.HTML
member.summary: Hypertext Markup Language

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat
member.summary: This enumeration provides the supported image formats.

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat.JPG
member.summary: Joint Photographic Experts Group

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat.PNG
member.summary: Portable Network Graphics

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat.BMP
member.summary: Windows Bitmap

member.name: F:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat.GIF
member.summary: Graphics Interchange Format

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceBody
member.summary: This class provides the structure of the ReportingCloud FindAndReplaceBody object used in the FindAndReplace method.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceBody.FindAndReplaceData
member.summary: The replacement list array for the find and replace process as an array of string arrays.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceBody.Template
member.summary: Optional. The template as a Byte array. Supported formats are RTF, DOC, DOCX and TX.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceBody.MergeSettings
member.summary: Optional. Optional merge settings to specify merge properties and document properties such as title and author.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeBody
member.summary: This class provides the structure of the ReportingCloud MergeBody object used in the Merge method.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeBody.MergeData
member.summary: The datasource for the merge process as a JSON array.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeBody.Template
member.summary: Optional. The template as a Byte array. Supported formats are RTF, DOC, DOCX and TX.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeBody.MergeSettings
member.summary: Optional. Optional merge settings to specify merge properties and document properties such as title and author.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord
member.summary: This class implements the structure of an IncorrectWord.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the spelled word.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord.Start
member.summary: Gets the starting position of a spelled word.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord.Text
member.summary: Gets the text of the spelled word.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord.IsDuplicate
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the spelled word is declared as incorrect, because the previous word has the same text.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.IncorrectWord.Language
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the language the incorrect word was spelled.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings
member.summary: This class provides the structure of the ReportingCloud MergeSettings object used in the Merge method.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.RemoveEmptyFields
member.summary: Optional. Specifies whether empty fields should be removed from the template or not. The default value is true.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.MergeHtml
member.summary: Optional. Specifies whether field data can contain formatted Html content or not. The default value is false.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.RemoveEmptyBlocks
member.summary: Optional. Specifies whether the content of empty merge blocks should be removed from the template or not. The default value is true.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.RemoveEmptyImages
member.summary: Optional. Specifies whether images which don't have merge data should be removed from the template or not. The default value is false.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.RemoveTrailingWhitespace
member.summary: Optional. Specifies whether trailing whitespace should be removed before saving a document. The default value is true.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.Author
member.summary: Optional. Sets the document's author.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.CreationDate
member.summary: Optional. Sets the document's creation date which will be saved in the document.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.CreatorApplication
member.summary: Optional. Sets the application, which has created the document.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.DocumentSubject
member.summary: Optional. Sets the document's subject string which will be saved in the document.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.DocumentTitle
member.summary: Optional. Sets the document's title that will be saved in the document.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.LastModificationDate
member.summary: Optional. Sets the date the document is last modified.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.UserPassword
member.summary: Optional. Sets the date the document is last modified.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeSettings.Culture
member.summary: Optional. Sets the culture for the merge process for date and currency values.

member.name: T:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud
member.summary: Text Control ReportingCloud .NET wrapper class.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: ReportingCloud constructor. Use your ReportingCloud credentials and the Web API base URL to create a new instance of ReportingCloud.
member.param: The username (e-mail address) of your ReportingCloud account.
The password of your ReportingCloud account.
The Web API base URL of ReportingCloud. This Base URL is listed here: http://api.reporting.cloud/documentation/reference/

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: ReportingCloud constructor. Use your ReportingCloud credentials to create a new instance of ReportingCloud.
member.param: The username (e-mail address) of your ReportingCloud account.
The password of your ReportingCloud account.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: ReportingCloud constructor. Use your ReportingCloud credentials to create a new instance of ReportingCloud.
member.param: An active and valid API Key that should be used for the transactions.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.#ctor(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: ReportingCloud constructor. Use your ReportingCloud credentials to create a new instance of ReportingCloud.
member.param: An active and valid API Key that should be used for the transactions.
The Web API base URL of ReportingCloud. This Base URL is listed here: http://api.reporting.cloud/documentation/reference/

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.Username
member.summary: The username (e-mail address) of the ReportingCloud account.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.APIKey
member.summary: An active and valid API Key that should be used for the transactions.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.Password
member.summary: The password of the ReportingCloud account.

member.name: P:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.WebApiBaseUrl
member.summary: The Web API base URL of ReportingCloud. Available URLs are listed here: http://api.reporting.cloud/documentation/reference/

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetTemplateThumbnails(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ImageFormat)
member.summary: This method returns a list of thumbnails of a specific template in the template storage.
member.param: The name of the template that should be used to create the thumbnails.
The desired zoom factor of the thumbnails.
The first page of the template that should be created as thumbnails.
The last page of the template that should be created as thumbnails.
The image format of the returned thumbnail images.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceDocument(TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.FindAndReplaceBody,System.String,TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method replaces strings in a document.
member.param: The FindAndReplaceBody object contains the replace data, optionally a template and merge settings.
The name of the template in the template storage.
The document format of the resulting document.
Specifies whether it is a test run or not. A test run is not counted against the quota and created documents contain a watermark.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.ShareDocument(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns the hash value that is used to share documents using the portal.
member.param: The name of the template in the template storage.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetAccountAPIKeys
member.summary: This method returns the available API Keys for the current account

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.CreateAccountAPIKey
member.summary: This method creates and returns a valid API Key for the current account

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.DeleteAccountAPIKey(System.String)
member.summary: This method deletes an available API Key that belongs to the current account
member.param: The API Key that should be deleted.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.MergeDocument(TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.MergeBody,System.String,TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method merges a template with data.
member.param: The MergeBody object contains the data, optionally a template and merge settings.
The name of the template in the template storage.
The document format of the resulting document.
Specifies whether the resulting documents should be appended or not.
Specifies whether it is a test run or not. A test run is not counted against the quota and created documents contain a watermark.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.UploadTemplate(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method uploads a template to the template storage.
member.param: The destination name of the template in the template storage.
The template data encoded as a Base64 string.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.ConvertDocument(System.Byte[],TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReturnFormat,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method converts a document to another format.
member.param: The source document data as a byte array.
The document format of the resulting document.
Specifies whether it is a test run or not. A test run is not counted against the quota and created documents contain a watermark.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetTemplateInfo(System.String)
member.summary: This method returns template information.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.CheckText(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This method checks text for spelling errors.
member.param: Specifies the text to spell check.
The language that is used to spell check the specified text.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetAvailableDictionaries
member.summary: This method returns the available dictionaries.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetSuggestions(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method returns suggestions for a misspelled word.
member.param: Specifies the incorrect word that has to be determined for suggestions.
The language that is used to create suggestions for the specified incorrect word.
Specifies the maximum number of suggestions that has to be determined.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetAccountSettings
member.summary: This method returns the account settings.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.GetTemplateCount
member.summary: This method returns the number of templates in the template storage.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.TemplateExists(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks whether a template exists or not in the template storage.
member.param: The source document data encoded as a Base64 string.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.DeleteTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: This method deletes a template from the template storage.

member.name: M:TXTextControl.ReportingCloud.ReportingCloud.DownloadTemplate(System.String)
